description.p: You've been around for a while. Maybe one year, maybe four or five. You've learned a lot, but not enough to get on enough jobs. Tough luck. Maybe you can find time in shop or on fantasy hockey jobs.

p.i: You've worked so many hockey jobs and have perfected your spotlight aim, but there just aren't enough opportunities to shine. Eager to act, you gain an extra attack when you need it. The gains you made lifting those heavy spotlights grant you extra strength in your times of need.

ul.li: Equipment:Two tech crew shirts, one polo, a pocket knife, a Scholar's Pack (a backpack, a book of lore, a bottle of ink, an ink pen, 10 sheets of parchment, and a little bag of sand.).

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I believe that anything worth doing is worth doing right. I can’t help it— I’m a perfectionist.
I always want to know how things work and what makes people tick.
Nobody stays angry at me or around me for long, since I can defuse any amount tension.
I hide scraps of food and trinkets away in my pockets.
I’m always picking things up, absently fiddling with them, and sometimes accidentally breaking them.
I take great pains to always look my best and follow the latest fashions.
I’m used to helping out those who aren’t as smart as I am, and I patiently explain anything and everything to others.
I’ve spent so long studying and doing homework that I have little practical experience dealing with people.
I am quiet and reserved, but observant. Nothing escapes my attention.
I quote (or misquote) sacred texts and proverbs in almost every situation.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Community. It is the duty of all people to strengthen the bonds of community. (Lawful)
Generosity. My talents were given to me so that I could use them to benefit the world. (Good)
Freedom. Everyone should be free to pursue his or her own livelihood. (Chaotic)
Greed. I’m only in it for the money. (Evil)
People. I’m committed to the people I care about, not to ideals. (Neutral)
Aspiration. I work hard to be the best there is at my craft.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I overlook obvious solutions in favor of complicated ones.
I speak without really thinking through my words, invariably insulting others.
In fact, the world does revolve around me.
I’ll do anything to get my hands on something rare or priceless.
I’m a sucker for a pretty face.
Gold seems like a lot of money to me, and I’ll do just about anything for more of it.
I can’t keep a secret to save my life, or anyone else’s.
I throw myself and my friends into situations rarely ever thinking about consequences.
My desire to experience new things causes me to make unsafe choices.
I am overly protective of nature, sometimes to the detriment of my companions and myself.

description.p: As a bonus action, you may make an extra ranged or ranged magic attack once per short rest.
When making a strength skill check, ability check, or saving throw, you may roll an additional d20 and use either result. You take 1d6 damage, straining yourself.

When making a strength skill check, ability check, or saving throw, you may roll an additional d20 and use either result. Your next roll of the same type will have disadvantage.
